supporting_spans: On this voyage in search of Captain Grant, the probabilities increased every day.
He was particularly interested in this young girl; and this feeling he concealed so well, that, except Miss Grant and himself, no one on board the Duncan had perceived it.
reasoning: Contradiction (factual): The character's statement directly contradicts the claim that he declined to take part in charting the maiden voyage of the Britannia.

analysis.claim_text: He declined to take part in charting the maiden voyage of the Britannia; when news of her wreck arrived he filled three diary pages with the sentence “I could have prevented it.”
